title: Cuisinart Stand Mixer Blender Attachment at Bed Bath & Beyond

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText: http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/product.asp?SKU=14649620. The Cuisinart Stand Mixer becomes even more versatile with the 40-ounce glass Blender Attachment. Connect this full-size blender to the high-speed power outlet on any Cuisinart Stand Mixer to whip up big batches of fresh smoothies, creamy milkshakes, frozen drinks or an endless variety of dips, sauces and batters. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Hi I'm Mary Rogers director of marketing communications for cuisinart. This is the cuisinarts stand mixer you can buy several attachment separately so that you can do so much more than mixing with your stand mixer. Today I'm going to show you our blender attachment it's our proprietary blender. You open the lid to your on stand mixer and there are several power ports but the one that you use for your blender is the high speed power port because you can be blending at high speed you mount it just by putting it on like this and twisting to lock it into place and you can use your blender to do so many great things by putting it on your stand mixer. You can make a past so you can make a smoothie. You can make a coffee drink with just ice cubes in it. You can also make a great man a grat. Just put the lid on and there you go you can use that as a blender attachment on your stand mixer.
